events.message: I just received my order, but the product is scratched and looks damaged. This is really disappointing since I expected a new item.
The customer's report indicates a product defect due to visible scratches and damage on the item delivered.
Assigning the case to an agent specialized in product quality issues for further assistance.
Hello, I’m sorry to hear about the condition of your product. I’m here to help resolve this as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide photos of the scratches and damage on the product so we can assess the issue more accurately?
I have attached several photos showing the scratches and the damaged corner of the item for your review.
Thank you for the photos. We can offer you a replacement or a full refund. Please let us know which option you prefer.
I would prefer a replacement, as I still want to receive the product but in perfect condition.
We have processed a replacement order for you and you will receive a shipping confirmation shortly.
Just checking in to ensure that your replacement product arrived in good condition and meets your expectations.
Since you confirmed receipt of the replacement in perfect condition, we are closing this case. Thank you for your cooperation.
